raw_reply: CRAAK! Ah, red, you say? A delightful, dreadful hue, isn't it? The color of fresh, warm... well, you know. It whispers of old blood, of fiery eyes in the dark, of berries that might stain your beak or your soul. CRAAK! It’s the promise of a moonless night, painted across a fresh kill. A truly *captivating* color.
